name: Exoplanets
description:
Exoplanets is an arcade game where you take control of EXPLOBOT 3000, a space robot created to find exoplanets.

The further you are, the more score you win by scanning exoplanets. 

This game was made for the Trijam #121 in almost 8 hours.

Softwares :

Unity - Visual Studio - Gimp

Musics :

Bush Week by Nihilore

To Begin Again by Pix
